review: If you're looking for a streaming solution this is the best entry level option. After purchasing the ChromeCast I quickly became annoyed with having to stream from a device (computer/phone/tablet). The Fire TV Stick has the apps locally so no need for a separate device. Also with this you get 30 days free of prime which has lots of movies and shows you've actually heard of.This is the product to get if you're debating the two.
author: R. P.

review: PLEX runs really laggy on this device and that's the only reason I bought it for. The PLEX app needed some serious update to fix this issue.Tried all the possible settings I googled to make it work better but it still did not make any difference. I'm sticking with my Chromecast for now until they fix the stuttering on PLEX-Fire TV Stick.
author: Joel Advincula

review: Works great. But with the need for the power source to the stick, very similar to the box version. Same quality as the box version, just at a much cheaper price.
author: DOUGLAS R BRITTON

review: Had a difficult time getting the device to pick up our wifi. Actually ended up taking our roku upstairs and trying this downstairs. Not much better. Took forever to download netflix and hulu. Screen freezes but audio runs. Wrestled for quite a while just to get batteries into the remote. Online now buying another roku device. Google chromecast even blows this away. Not worth the money.
author: Tina Stawiarski

review: So simple to install, started using it right away. Need to get another one
author: Leticia Molina

review: I have Amazon Prime and I used my smart TV to access my subscription.  I found out that wasn't the easy way to do it.I ordered the Fire TV Stick and all my problems we solved.  It was easy to install and easy to use.  Plus I have the benefitsof the subscription at my finger tips. great product at a great price.

review: I don't have cable, this product is AMAZING so far! I've only had it for about a week and there is still so much to explore on there! I recommended this to family already.
author: Amber

review: This would be awesome if it didn't stop to buffer all the time. Really irritating. I loved the concept of an out of the way streaming device, and it was very easy to set up as well as being very user friendly. But the constant interruptions in streaming isn't tolerable. Glad I only paid $19 for it.
